name: privatebot
description: A discord bot written for my personal use, published on Github

scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs && npx typedoc --entryPointStrategy Expand src
scripts.start: javascript-obfuscator ./dist --compact true --dead-code-injection true --self-defending false --rename-globals true --output ./dist && node .
scripts.startNew: tsc --module commonjs && npx typedoc --entryPointStrategy Expand src && javascript-obfuscator ./dist --compact true --dead-code-injection true --self-defending false --rename-globals true --output ./dist && node .

author: Montrii
